String.string: For Valorous Service
The Temple of the Tree
Enter the Temple of the Tree.
Defeat the Argon Soldiers.
The Whereabouts of Anya and the Guardians
You see Lacedir, one of the village guardians.
Ask about Anya and the guardians.
"I'll find him. You stay here. Help the soldiers."
Ask Lacedir about Anya and the other children.
The Whereabouts of Anya and the Guardians
You can't see anything through all the argons.
Look for Deplen.
Defeat the Argon occupiers.
The Whereabouts of Anya and the Guardians
You see Deplen, lying wounded in the water.
Ask about Anya and the guardians.
"I've got a better idea."
Talk to Deplen the Guardian.

Use the flare gun to call the Valkyon Federation soldiers to rescue Deplen.

Press [ key to open the Inventory window and right-click the Flare Gun.]
"Rest easy. Help is on the way."
Talk to Deplen.
